messages.message:
so some update on this effort.
we are able to fine tune mixtral but it is painfully slow and blind (our gpus are 40gb and we need 80gb to do proper training with check pointing, currently we train blind) 
we haven't evaluated the trained models yet because we need to quantize it to 4bit to serve it will vllm and we are still working on that.

Having stated that, we don't expect that the 4bit version will behave that well but we will update this thread with results when we have them!
